column5: Day 4 on Cliff lake.Brought my Alabama casters to another lake.Absolutely beautifully morning.Water like glass.Water temp around 72f there.Lots of casting and a few small pike and saw a few muskies.Managed a small one but a first one for Coy and Warren had one on and got off when it came out of the watet.Had a couple of big girls come to the boat but they were quick to leave but the boys enjoyed seeing them in the clear water of Cliff.Got a few smallmouth on a couple of reefs and they were very shallow.Warren had one on and a 40" muskie took it and his jig on the surface.that was exciting.Hot afternoon that got ugly fast.Lightning all around us lots of Thunder and then down pour again.They wanted out of that so ran back and loaded boat at 2.3 days rain and one dry day.lol.
Did your guests talk your ears off about Alabama football? If so, they were telling the truth.
Haha.Not much talk about football.But everything else that's going on in the world.They were from Montgomery.
Nice pics, Thanks for the report.
